title: Describing Problems
description: Learn to clearly explain problems and situations at B1 level.

steps.teacher: 我遇到一件有點棘手的事情。
expected_answer: 我遇到一件有點棘手的事情。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yù dào yí jiàn yǒu diǎn jí shǒu de shì qíng.
steps.english_hint: I ran into something a bit tricky.

steps.teacher: 目前的進度比預期慢了一點。
expected_answer: 目前的進度比預期慢了一點。
steps.pinyin: mù qián de jìn dù bǐ yù qī màn le yì diǎn.
steps.english_hint: The progress is slightly slower than expected.

steps.teacher: 我還在找問題出在哪裡。
expected_answer: 我還在找問題出在哪裡。
steps.pinyin: wǒ hái zài zhǎo wèn tí chū zài nǎ lǐ.
steps.english_hint: I'm still figuring out what caused the problem.

steps.teacher: 看起來需要多花一點時間處理。
expected_answer: 看起來需要多花一點時間處理。
steps.pinyin: kàn qǐ lái xū yào duō huā yì diǎn shí jiān chǔ lǐ.
steps.english_hint: It seems this will take more time to handle.

steps.teacher: 雖然事情變複雜了，但還是能解決。
expected_answer: 雖然事情變複雜了，但還是能解決。
steps.pinyin: suī rán shì qíng biàn fù zá le, dàn hái shì néng jiě jué.
steps.english_hint: Although things got complicated, it’s still solvable.

steps.teacher: 我正在一步一步排查問題。
expected_answer: 我正在一步一步排查問題。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài yí bù yí bù pái chá wèn tí.
steps.english_hint: I'm checking the issue step by step.

steps.teacher: 我已經找到部分原因，但還需要再確認。
expected_answer: 我已經找到部分原因，但還需要再確認。
steps.pinyin: wǒ yǐ jīng zhǎo dào bù fèn yuán yīn, dàn hái xū yào zài què rèn.
steps.english_hint: I found part of the reason but need to confirm more.

steps.teacher: 主要的困難是時間安排不太夠。
expected_answer: 主要的困難是時間安排不太夠。
steps.pinyin: zhǔ yào de kùn nán shì shí jiān ān pái bù tài gòu.
steps.english_hint: The main challenge is the lack of time.

steps.teacher: 我需要一些協助才能更快解決問題。
expected_answer: 我需要一些協助才能更快解決問題。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xū yào yì xiē xié zhù cái néng gèng kuài jiě jué wèn tí.
steps.english_hint: I need some help to solve the problem faster.

steps.teacher: 我會盡快整理好情況，讓大家清楚了解。
expected_answer: 我會盡快整理好情況，讓大家清楚了解。
steps.pinyin: wǒ huì jǐn kuài zhěng lǐ hǎo qíng kuàng, ràng dà jiā qīng chǔ liǎo jiě.
steps.english_hint: I'll organize the situation soon so everyone understands clearly.
